Reviews.Title: Esky C5900 H.264
Reviews.Author: Byzan
Reviews.Content: I looked all over for a good camera that would give me good quality video at a good price. The Esky c5900 meets all my needs. It is very simple to set up. The instructions are very clear. I am going to buy 4 more of these as soon as i am done with this review. Thank you Amazon and Esky

Reviews.Title: Great product...
Reviews.Author: Jaime Monroy
Reviews.Content: I choose this cam because of dvr built in, I like the easy way to configure wireless connection. I spent to much time because of my pc but at the ends camera worked perfectly.It would be great if this system had zoom function but because of the price I know this is impossible he he.I recommend this product to people who needs to take care about home or office, and wants to access from everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Move along, nothing to see here
Reviews.Author: J.E.
Reviews.Content: I bought this cam thinking it looked enough like an FI8918w. It works fine through IE ActiveX, but doesn't stream audio to iOS/Android, making it useless as a baby monitor. This wasn't worth the headache, and I'm an IT pro.Update: after weeks of trying to work this thing and contacting support only to be ignored, I've concluded that this product has no way to stream audio to iOS or Android. No one but other disgruntled users has answered any of my forum postings either. I purchased an actual Foscam camera and it's made all the difference in the world. the FI8910w I purchased as a replacement streams audio and video to my portable devices without a hitch to every device I've set it up on. Esky is a big no-no.

ProductInfo.Features:
H.264 IP Camera,Local Micro SD card storage
Pan/Tilt remote control ,2-way audio,night vision
Internet WiFi Wireless/Wired
IR cut,Support Mac/Windows/Linux
Build-in DVR ,Motion triggered
